label: 八講会
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Also hakkō. A celebration of the Lotus Sutra....As the name suggests, there were eight sessions, held twice daily over a four-day period, during which each of the eight books (maki) of the sutra was expounded and praised in trun (p. 236n). [巻]
